definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: I throw my head back and laugh, thinking of these unkempt old men.
sentences.chinese: 想着这些衣着不整的老男人，我晃了晃头然后笑了。

sentences.english: Women have to be modestly dressed,no jewelry, saved through childbearing.
sentences.chinese: 女人必须衣着简朴，不能戴首饰，通过生育得到救赎。

sentences.english: When I was last in China, my loose-fitting, mix-and-match preppy-catalog clothing stood out.
sentences.chinese: 我最后一次在中国时，我宽松随意的衣着很是显眼。

sentences.english: I must express my respect for others and myself by dressing decently.
sentences.chinese: 我要以衣着打扮表达出对自己和别人的尊重。

sentences.english: Maybe she dresses well, is efficient or extremely punctual.
sentences.chinese: 比如，夸女孩衣着得体，办事有效率或者是极其守时。

sentences.english: How does a stroller's dress and hairdo become fashionable?
sentences.chinese: 一个流浪汉的衣着和发型怎么成潮流的？

sentences.english: Clothing has always been subject to change based on the dictates of fashion and whims.
sentences.chinese: 衣着往往随着时尚潮流的趋势和心血来潮而发生变化。

sentences.english: John felt it hard to rig out his family.
sentences.chinese: 约翰感到难以为一家大小置备衣着。

sentences.english: The ragged rascal ran around the rugged rocks round and round.
sentences.chinese: 衣着槛褛的流氓围着崎岖的岩石转了又转。

sentences.english: First, he is very handsome, and second, his dress and hairdo are very fashionable.
sentences.chinese: 首先，他长得挺帅的，第二，他的衣着和发型都很潮。

sentences.english: Clothes and bedding not stored in a wardrobe in the camphor ball .
sentences.chinese: 衣着被褥不要存放在有樟脑球的衣柜中。

sentences.english: The boy was at loggerheads with his parents over his long hair and untidy clothes.
sentences.chinese: 男孩和他的父母因长发和不整洁的衣着吵了起来。

sentences.english: Don't dawdle over your clothing. You're so beautiful already.
sentences.chinese: 不要再在衣着上花费时间了，你已经够漂亮的了。

sentences.english: It’s not just her smart clothes and pink mobile phone.
sentences.chinese: 这改变当然包括合体的衣着和粉红色的手机。

sentences.english: I do not like she is (dress).
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢她的衣着打扮。

sentences.english: He was always neatly and quietly dressed in accordance with his age and station.
sentences.chinese: 他向来衣着整洁素雅，合乎他的年龄和身份。

definition: to decorate/to dress/to make up/to adorn/manner of dressing/style of dress
to decorate/to adorn/to dress up/to disguise oneself
